summary: Adds a suit of light armor made from a Spriggan.
descriptionHtml:
Hello!
This is another armor mod, this time adding a light armor made from the corpse of a Spriggan.
It can be crafted at the forge with no perk requirements
It can be upgraded
Available for both men and women
Glows in the frickin' dark! 


If there are any problems please leave a comment. User Images are greatly appreciated

My other mods: 

Coats for Skyrim : https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/92852

Stormcloak Warrior Armor : https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/92869

Mage's Plate Armor :https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/92916
author: QwibQwibMods
